title: As a person who plays melee champs
body: There's been a massive rise in adc's in other lanes. Honestly that's not really an issue. Lane diversity is always a plus. But with the current meta revolving around winning lane, Adc's have an advantage because they can bully so effectively with little to no counterplay. Does anyone else agree or disagree?

the issue im seing here is that 2 or 3 adc are on almost every team. if a team would pick a jungle graves, quinn or kindred **instead** of an adc on bot lane, it wouldnt be the issue.

the only exception i can see to this is rare cases of extreme synergy like between blitzcrank and darius who could get an amlost guaranteed kill on a hooked squishy.

{{item:1054}} is the weakest of the three Dorans items by a significant amount. The other two got alternatives with varying success {{item:1083}} {{item:1082}} but the shield did not. There's room for improvement here.

* First of all, a {{item:1055}} gives the same amount of health, and {{item:1056}} gives only 20 less. Shouldn't the shield, the defensive item of the three, give significantly more HP than the other two? Or maybe some resists on top of the HP? Makes sense to me.


* And that HP regen, that's pretty slow stuff right there. Maybe it should double or triple for X seconds if struck by an enemy champion, like {{item:3211}}.


* How about instead of blocking a set amount of damage all game, it could scale with something. Perhaps this would make the item scale too well into the late game, but Riot wasn't worried too much about that when they gave {{item:1055}} lifesteal instead of healing a set amount like {{item:1083}} does.


* Finally, if you're worried about ranged champions abusing it, make it melee only.

Or, perhaps instead of buffing the shield, we come up with the alternative item specifically designed to protect melees against being harassed down by ranged poke. Take the blocking passive from the shield, increase it dramatically, and there you have it.
